body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

Convert-Path test was failing on non-Windows as `$TestDrive` was passed to `Resolve-FilePath` which simply returned it back.  But apparently `$TestDrive` is an array, so the comparison fails.  Fix is to just use `FileInfo` to resolve path as a string on all platforms.
